## Bee.downloadFile() method

Download single file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
downloadFile(resource: Reference | Uint8Array | string, path?: string, options?: DownloadOptions, requestOptions?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<FileData<Bytes>>;
```

## Exceptions

TypeError if some of the input parameters is not expected type

BeeArgumentError if there is passed ENS domain with invalid unicode characters
